data.name: Golden Retriever
data.detailed_description:
Become A Gold Miner!

Beware of Dinos



  • Rent is due at the end of every month

In this mining platformer, traverse your underground mine shafts to retrieve gold! Go into the mines and extract as much gold as you can. Setup your operation and reinvest your earnings into better gear and equipment. This line of work not only separates the gold from the dirt, but the pups from the dogs. With danger lurking in the ancient grounds, hungry Dinos awaken, searching for prey and loot. The wise miner doesn’t fear the Dino but sees it’s flesh and bones as a potential fuel source for their operations. Gold mining is a treasure hunt, so open your miner’s map, test some dirt, and find that stash of gold!

Bring dirt with gold in it to the surface. Wash away the dirt, then forge the remaining gold nuggets into coins to pay for your rent.

data.short_description: Fat Cat wants his rent and the only way to get it is by digging down into the gold rich dirt. Prospect, mine, and maintain, all while keeping Dinos at bay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th Gen or Equivalent
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 940MX or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: Any
